description.text:
What does the book say?

  $(b;winter)-The knight protecting this eye, gained his power by making a contract with a demon. After the war the demon came to claim the Knights soul and took the eye to his own dimension. - $()

 That's what you get from making a contract and telling your name! Ah...uhm! Don't worry I won't come for your soul....yet! -the Pixie giggles-
